answers.answer: I just turned 22 n didn't want kids n im expecting a lil girl too ^-^ I still have a hard time believing im pregnant and about to be a mother n im 35 weeks lol im sooo excited to and im always googling something about the baby...I think its first time mom jitters!  But if you haven't already just look forward to glucose testing.
Ok :) so its not just me :p .. im so excited to meet her im forever looking up names ect.  Names are sohard to pick. Wow u only have 5 weeks so exciting .... what is glucose testing??

When they check to see if you have gestational diabetes which is a form of diabetes that only appears during pregnancy and usually goes away afterwards....what happens is your midwife will tell you to stop eating after a certain time and you will only be able to drink water after that...then the next day you will drink a real sugary drink n sit n the office from an hr up to 3hrs n then they will draw your blood...is not bad tho I promise!
Ohh ok sounds fine thanks for the help :) best of luck with the rest of ur pregnancy
Thank you!!! And good luck with yours as well!
Good glad to hear its normal :) ... so nervous
I'm 11 weeks and I don't really feel pregnant is that normal I haven't had morning sickness or any real cravings i t just makes me panic at times.

question: 21 & ftm . So excited but so nervous about everything .. is it normal to be so afraid ?? Like im constantly just hoping baby is healthy and that everything goes well I am 28weeks but it still doesnt feel real . I feel baby kick all the time and it makes me fall inlove with her over and over but i just cant imagine bringing her home from hospital and being a mum. Is anyone else like this..?? Any advice?. Also i have my 7month checkup with midwife on tuesday and i have no idea what to expect does anyone kno wat the routine is for 7month check up in the hospital?? . Sorry for all the questions . Just so worried and new to everything X
title: 7month midwife app
